name: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline
name_original: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline
description:
A UE4 Zelda top-down prototype game whose objective is to create a remake of Zelda on nes.
Once you have your sword in hand, go exploring to earn items, hearts and rupees, and scour the dungeons to find the fragments of the Triforce.

CONTROLS
(Keyboard) / (Controller)
Movement = Arrow Keys / Left Stick
Sword = X / A Button
Interact = C / B Button
Items = S and D / X and Y Button
Shield = SPACE / L and R Button
Inventory = A / Start Button
Menu = ESCAPE / Back Button

CREDITS
Developer: Lloyd Empty
Composer: Alcibiade
